member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC
member.summary: Describes a binding (fixed for the duration of the render pass) to a depth stencil view (DSV), as well as its beginning and ending access characteristics.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.cpuDescriptor
member.summary: A . The CPU descriptor handle corresponding to the depth stencil view (DSV).

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthBeginningAccess
member.summary: A . The access to the depth buffer requested at the transition into a render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilBeginningAccess
member.summary: A . The access to the stencil buffer requested at the transition into a render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthEndingAccess
member.summary: A . The access to the depth buffer requested at the transition out of a render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilEndingAccess
member.summary: A . The access to the stencil buffer requested at the transition out of a render pass.
